title: A bibliometric analysis from 1997 to 2023 examining the research trends in eliminating taste and odor compounds from drinking water
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00645C, Critical Review
Xiaoran Xu, Jinquan Wan, Guanghua Wang, Qiangqiang Sun, Pengfei Ren, Qiu Li, Zhili Du, Jingyi Sun, Yan Chen
